item.title: Doc, Hands of Steel
item.description: Doc, Hands of Steel is a 1965 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alfonso Balcázar.

item.title: Clint the Stranger
item.description: Clint the Stranger, also known as Clint the Nevada's Loner, Nevada Clint and Clint, the Lonely Nevadan, is a 1967 Italian spaghetti western starring George Martin. A sequel entitled The Return of Clint the Stranger would follow in 1972.

item.title: Los Pistoleros de Arizona
item.description: Five Thousand Dollars on One Ace is a 1964 Spanish Spaghetti Western film directed by Alfonso Balcázar, scored by Angelo Francesco Lavagnino and Don Powell, and starring Robert Woods, Fernando Sancho and Helmut Schmid.

item.title: Professionisti per un massacro
item.description: Red Blood, Yellow Gold, is a 1967 Italian-Spanish spaghetti western film directed by Nando Cicero.

item.title: L'uomo che viene da Canyon City
item.description: Man from Canyon City is a 1965 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alfonso Balcázar.

item.title: Perché uccidi ancora
item.description: Perché uccidi ancora is a 1965 Italian western film adventure directed by José Antonio de la Loma and Edoardo Mulargia.

item.title: The Return of Clint the Stranger
item.description: The Return of Clint the Stranger is a 1972 Italian-Spanish Western film directed by Alfonso Balcázar and starring Klaus Kinski. The film is a sequel to Clint the Stranger.
